mapper.select: SELECT bd_index.id, bd_index.index_id, bd_index.`year`, bd_index.`month`, bd_index.provice, bd_index.unit, bd_index.amount, bd_index.`group`, bd_index.corp, bd_index.create_date, bd_index.create_by, bd_index.update_date, bd_index.update_by, bd_index.data_update_date FROM bd_index WHERE bd_index.index_id=${index_id}
